events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was assigned the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
My order number is 54321 and I have attached a photo showing that the item does not match the one I ordered.
We verified the information and will initiate a full refund immediately. You will receive an email confirmation shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this matter efficiently.
The refund process has been completed and the case is now closed. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your order resolution.
We are closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
